document_data.caption: A map of Kalb Bahriy Sahr in the Djinni's Claws.
document_data.name: Kalb Bahriy Sahr
document_data.mainbody: '''Kalb Bahriy Sahr''', or the '''Shark Reef''', was a island chain formed from coral reefs. This reef was located in the [[Djinni's Claws]] in the [[Crowded Sea]] southwest of mainland [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography:
These small islands were composed of coral and rock. No known charts existed for safely navigating them, making most sailors give them a wide berth.

Dangerous waves and powerful storms surrounding the reef regularly dashed ships against the islands if they got too close.
document_data.Inhabitants: As the name implied, the waters surrounding these islands were teeming with sharks of all sizes represented by many different species.
